item.description:
Any ladies out there interested in gathering as a small group for dinner and pub outing this Friday? Join myself and another newcomer friend Emily for Indian cuisine followed by a visit to Duck and Bunny, maybe Wickenden Pub to close out the night.

The rsvp limit is low to allow for what comes best with small groups - good conversation. There is a waiting list, to potentially expand the group slightly but for dinner we'd probably sit at two tables.

No offense intended to our guy members. Just needing a night out to nurture our female friendships.

Please make sure to bring cash in case they give us a hard time for separate checks.
item.name: Ladies Nite out on Wickenden
